price: Indeed, we used to call upon Him before. He is indeed the Most Kind, the Most Merciful.”
arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
